General.Name: Summit Environmental Corporation Inc
General.Description: Summit Environmental Corporation, Inc. markets fire suppression and retardant products in the United States. The company offers FlameOut, which is non-toxic and biodegradable firefighting foam to municipal fire departments, forestry services, and the military and other federal government agencies. It markets its bulk firefighting products through strategic alliances and directly to the end user. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Oak Creek, Wisconsin.
General.Address: 610 West Rawson Avenue, Oak Creek, WI, United States, 53154
